description:
THE DRIFTING FUN:
* Drifting mechanics with easy controls
* Hit handbrake to go sideways and start drifting
* LOTS OF SMOKE - BURN TIRES!

CARS AND TUNING:
* Over 30 powerful Cars with their unique bodykits to choose, driving style and setup.
* Different driving styles - DRIFTING, SIMULATOR, AWD
* Upgrade car engine to make it more powerful with more Horsepowers

CUSTOMIZATION:
* Customize cars on DYNO to make them more effective for your driving style
* Choose colours for Different car parts, Body, rims, Windows,
* Create unique vinyls with in-game tools

ONLINE And GAME MODES:
* Classic circuit drift mode
* Touge Drift - Don't be afraid to drift with high speed up on the mountain
* Create or Join ONLINE sessions for Tandem Drifts with your friends, challenge them or make fun together and become Drift King.
name: Drift King
